title: Are students from rr preferred over ec during placements?
content: Say I'm from cse ecc, and another counterpart of mine is from rrc. You're an interviewer, what would I have to do to be preferred over my rrc counterpart(if I have to do anything). Would companies pick rrc student over ecc just cause they're from rrc? Or are there restrictions by companies saying only rrc students are allowed to interview?

comments.body: 99% of companies do not care about your campus
As a student you should prefer rr campus but It doesn't matter during placements
why so? imo in a city like bangalore with hellish traffic it's always better to choose the campus that's closer to your place.

As an alumni, yes it does matter for around 20% of the companies that appeared during the last few months of the placement season, or atleast did so for my batch '24 during peak recession. For the rest 80%, it did not matter much and I expect it to be much better for the current batches.
